reviews.review: Идеальное продолжение серии HL. Не думал, что будет настолько крутая игра.
Örök Klasszikus!!
Да игра игра детства!!!

Con Half Life 2 Valve lo volvió a hacer. Una obra maestra en todos los aspectos y un juego muy adelantado a su tiempo, como en su época lo estuvo ''Half Life''. Soluciona todos los fallos que tuvo el primero (que por otro lado también es un juego excelente) como por ejemplo el problema de la velocidad del personaje, que en este juego se soluciona gracias a que el personaje puede esprintar o andar o el problema del ''FOV'', también solucionado.

Half Life 2 es un juego excelente que destaca en muchos aspectos. Un aspecto a destacar es su manera de narrar la trama del juego, la cual se hace sin NINGUNA cutscene, todo in-game, y además no te atosiga con tutoriales estúpidos, como enseñarte a agacharte o a saltar. Lo hace de una manera muy discreta, enseñándote aspectos del juego en pequeñas dosis pero nunca llegando a ser pesado. Otro aspecto muy destacable son los gráficos, el juego tiene prácticamente 10 años y aún y así los gráficos siguen siendo muy buenos y en muchos aspectos gana a muchos juegos de hoy en día, como el aspecto de poder jugar con las físicas, de coger objetos, la vistosidad del agua... Por otra parte la historia te sumerge en un mundo muy interesante, con una trama que te deja enganchado hasta el final y te hace ganas de querer más. Recomiendo jugar ''Half Life 1'' primero, ya que es otro juego increíble y los hechos de este juego están conectados con el suceso de Black Mesa de la primera parte (las expansiones de ''Half Life 1'' son completamente prescindibles, a no ser que quieras conocer algunos detalles de la historia).

Eso sí, no todo son rosas en Half Life 2. No hay ningún juego perfecto, y este no es la excepción. Este juego tiene el PEOR doblaje al español que he oído en mi vida, sin exagerar. No se cómo de bueno será el doblaje latino, ni siquiera sé si tiene doblaje latino, pero yo soy español y he de decir que el doblaje me a hecho sangrar las orejas, a excepción quizás el de Gman, cuya voz creo que es la más soportable gracias a que tiene la excusa de tener problemas respiratorios. Al final el doblaje te acaba resultando hasta gracioso, pero hasta entonces... prepárate para lo equivalente a la coprofagia auditiva. Gordon tiene que dar las gracias por ser mudo.

Salvo este pequeño detalle, Half Life 2 es un juego increíble, un hito en el mundo videojugabilístico, un punto de referencia en este mundillo el cual sin ninguna duda muchos desarrolladores tendrían que girarse a mirar.

Half Life 2 es una experiencia ¿Qué esperas para vivirla?

A man get´s thrown into a world with alien species, after meeting his friend who he hasn´t seen since the events of hl1, he for some reason decides to go to an apartment building and get´s into trouble.

Pros:

+ The graphics, for a game made in 2004, this game looks awesome and still looks better then most 2008 games.

+ The gameplay, This game is a great singleplayer first-person shooter, there also contain some physics puzzles in some parts of the game as varation.

+ The story is awesome, and unlike HL1, you feel connected to the story.

+ The atmosphere, HL2 has one of the most powerful atmosphere i have ever seen, some parts of the game can make 

you feel like you are being hunted, some parts make you feel like you are in a safe haven (Like rebel bases for example), And some parts are just creepy.

+ The loading times, most loading times are less then 10 seconds, i have an HDD and the game loads well.

+ Storage space, The game is about 4 gb when it's on your drive (Not including EP1, EP2, Lost Coast or Half-life Source)

+ Subtitles, If you don't understand what the characters are saying or what you are hearing, you can turn on the Captions and it will show subtitles (The subtitles are availible in lot's of languages.)

+ System Requirements, Most computers can run this game very well, as it isn't highly demanding, just make sure you have a good CPU.

Cons

- Lacks graphical settings, some graphics settings have to be set trough the console.

- The characters walk trough objects if the object is blocking their path.

- The loading zones are placed in strange places.

- No multiplayer.

- Glitchy AI.

- Loading the game takes an unnessecery long time, due to it loading a background map.

- There is a high chance that HL3 will never see the light of day.

Начнём с приятного.
Опять поезд! Выходим вроде в какой то утопии, всё загадочно! Ну, думаю, сейчас понесется.

Вот как бы и всё. Приличного развития сюжета в длиннущих диалогах нет. Попытка показать отношениями между NPC с псевдонаучными диалогами, от которых разит профанством за милю. 
Затем, разучились делать окружение. Ощущение что бегаешь по декорациям, а не по местам, где живут люди. 
Единственное место, где хоть какая то атмосфера, это кладбище, где можно в усласть пораскидывать циркулярные пилы в гущи зомби.
И концовка. Безжизненная башня без деталей. Похоже денег и фантазии вообще ни на что не хватило. Там я уже играл через силу, начал скучать по предыдущим декорациям.

Ciesząca oko grafika, wciągająca fabuła i barwne charaktery zapewniają graczowi kilkanaście godzin rozrywki. Gdy ukończymy grę, możemy pobawić się w odblokowywanie osiągnięć Steam. Gra jest dobrze wydana i powinna znaleźć się na liście tytułów obowiązkowych dla każdego gracza.

Amazing game.

Yeah this game lives up to the hype. Even ten years later, this game still impresses people. The story never stops engaging, the gameplay is fluid, the music is solid, ect. ect. ect.

I never heard of this game until I saw that it was on sale. Being such a highly rated game, I was sure it wouldn't disappoint. It hasn't. I'm about done with the campaign and it has been a fun little journey. It's definitely a must play for anyone who's enjoyed a fps.

The only problem I have with it is that Gordon Freeman isn't relatable at all.. for two reasons in my opinion. 1) He is one of the classic silent video game heros. 2) He is praised by all. There's no internal issues, no doubters, nobody to prove himself to, no emotions, no struggle apart from saving everyone.

The one con I've noticed is easy to forgive though. Everything else is immersive enough..and if you don't feel a part of the story, go buy a fancy new Oculus Rift! This game has native support. 

All in all, great game. Inspired me to make a Let's Play series.

Один раз я даже взорвал ворота на водоеме, просто поднявшись на мостик и прицелившись выстрелил (в комнаты не заходил).  В общем ни в сказке сказать, ни пером описать. 10 из 10. Шедевр!

Всегда нравились шутеры.
С первой частью Half-Life я познакомился лет в 8.Тогда,когда я получил монтировку,и начил бить зомби,мама это увидела,и сказала чтобы я выключил немедленно.Я выключил.Но втихоря играл в неё.Я даже не знал названия этого экшена.Я просто играл,с огромным увлечением.С Half-Life 2 я познаомился позже лет таки в 10-11,а может раньше,именно тогда я узнал название этой игры.В общем моя оценка 10\10 лучше этого шутера,нет ничего.Гейб и его команда,трудились,трудятся,и будут трудится не напрасно.

This game is honestly awesome. It was one of the first PC games ever to highlight a physics-driven and realistic gameplay engine. The storyline is great, and the graphics are not even close to being horrible, especially considering how old it is. There is a reason it is ranked in the top ten Metascores on all of Steam. The game revolutionized PC gaming, and is great for gamers who have lower-end PCs. I myself bought this and played it solely because I knew it would run well on my older computer while I was waiting for my newer laptop to come in.

half ife is the first pc game that ive ever played with linux and it works very well even with an older machine. The game looks brilliant even though its 10 years old this year ( 2014 ). half life 2 has a great story line to it both gripping and confusing, the levels that you go through are very dull and 'evil ' in some places as the nature of the game is the worlds being taken from our grasp ( so theres not loads of lighter colours ), nearly everything ive found is interactive ( the toilets even flush, theres lots of rubbish to be picked up and thrown around (: ) which this isnt the case in most games now a days especially the console games and theres zombie like things, giant bugs, frieghtning people in masks like from killzone, a hover craft level, dune buggy oh and a big 'dog' made of metal :)
great game 10/10 rating looking forward to playing the whole thing through again.
thumbs up if your going to purchase this game from steam.

Das bekannte Half Life. Für mich eins der besten Spiele die ich jemals spielen durfte. Es wird einfach nicht langweilig und neben einer herrvoragenden Landschaft und revolutionären Gestalten, ist die Story ein echtes Muss. Als Gordon Freeman und mit einer Brechstange bewaffnet, erlebt man ein Abenteuer das zurecht eins der erfolgreichsten in der Geschichte von Steam und Valve sind. Meine Erwartungen wurden bei Half Life 2 komplett erfüllt und ich glaube das jeder hier in Steam diese Spiel mal gespielt haben sollte.

Some people want to kill me for this, but I am gonna say it anyways. 
This game, is a fucking masterpiece, BUT, the beggining chapters, where you are escaping choppers and going through sewers....It was pretty damn boring for me. I played this game around June of 2013, and there was a point where i just couldn't take it anymore, I was bored out of my mind, and uninstalled it.
I picked up the game yet again, on December, just before the chapter "We don't go to Ravenholm".....And...Holy shit, after that chapter, the game was filled with intense action, scary moments thanks to the well known headcrab zombies, intense fights from the rebels against the combine, driving scenes (Pretty meh, but they aren't bad at all, just....Not really into my taste). 
After that chapter, I couldn't stop playing the game, and I finished it in about 2 days, It was DEFINITELY worth it.
Aside from the slow start, this game doesn't fail to dissapoint.
